prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon that resembles a small diamond creature.
I want a Pokemon that sparkles and has a shiny gray and blue color scheme.
Generate a small, adorable Pokemon that lives in caves and mountains.
Make a fairy-type Pokemon with a fluffy body and bright blue eyes.
Imagine a mystical creature that blends well into forest habitats.
Design a Pokemon with a unique heart-like shape and glimmering features.
Show me a Pokemon that evolves from a crystal-like form and has an enchanting appearance.
